@@title User: ${id}

{% if id %}
h2. User: ${id}
{{user_info: guid:'$$id'}}


{{actions:
- display: Edit User
  action: '#user_edit'

- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/system/usermanager/delete?username=$$id
  navigateback: true
}}

|*Groups*|${", ".join(groups)} |
|*Emails*|${", ".join(emails)} |
|*Domain*|${domain} |
|*Authkey*|${authkey} |

{{user_edit: guid:'$$id'}}

{% else %}
No user found with id $$id
{% endif %}
